Articles.Content: Would it be possible to release the versions of KSP before 0.7.3 so we can delve even deeper into the wonderful history of this game?  I'm sure people would be interested to go even further back (myself included).  Or have those versions been lost to the sands of time?
We have a thread for this- http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/131906-the-earliest-versions-of-kerbal-space-program/
Yeah, because versions before 0.7.3 were never public, they might not even exist anymore. :/

4 hours ago, GluttonyReaper said:

Yeah, because versions before 0.7.3 were never public, they might not even exist anymore. :/

I think they showed earlier versions on one of their streams.
